Kunder av gartnere og anleggsarbeidere er sjeldent til stede n√•r jobben blir utf√∏rt. Ved bruk av sporingsenheter f√•r du muligheten til √• bevise at de ansatte var til stede i de faktiske timene kunden blir fakturert. I tillegg vil maskinenes brukstimer kartlegge timer lagt ned i oppdraget.

La telematikk hjelpe deg med √• fange opp problemer med utstyret f√∏r det g√•r i stykker. Resultatet er at det er mindre sannsynlig for at gressklipper og minigraver bryter sammen mens dine gartnere er p√• oppdrag, i tillegg √∏ker sikkerheten blant dine ansatte.

Let‚Äôs navigate back in time to how the small, Norwegian startup evolved into a significant SaaS company with phenomenal growth. It all started in the small town of Larvik, Norway in 2007. The entrepreneurs Bj√∏rn Erik Brands√¶ter Helgeland and Petter Quinsgaard had an idea of being the solution provider for basic tracking needs through high-quality GPS positioning.

With a significant in-house developing team, ABAX soon found new ways in using data going from being hardware-centric to hardware agnostic to help the customer manage their assets, in new ways.¬† In 2022, we simplify the everyday life of our customers by providing intuitive solutions that help them become more efficient.

We have grown from being a vehicle tracking company covering mileage claims to becoming a leading SaaS provider, offering management solutions for all moving company assets¬†such as vehicles, machinery, equipment, and tools.

We have more than¬†300 employees divided between sales, customer¬†service, marketing, people and performance as well as quality and product development. We have offices in¬†Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, the Netherlands, Belgium, Poland and the UK with our headquarters in Larvik, Norway.¬†Are you ready to build both yourself as an individual as well as products¬†that have an impact on people‚Äôs everyday life? Then apply to¬†one of our open positions! Join the team. Build the Future.
Your growth is our growth! That is why we invest in our people.

Because so are we! At ABAX we constantly need to be at the forefront of providing smart solutions that will give our customers easy access to all parts of their work, regardless if they are in their car, at the office or out in the field. Working at ABAX, you will be part of a fast-growing and creative company helping customers save money and time!

We always look for new ways to approach a challenge. We bring people, technology, data, and ideas together to develop solutions for tomorrow. We are curious and embrace change.‚Äã Together with our customers and partners, we systematically look for new ways to leverage potential for existing business and new business opportunities through the networking of objects and data. For mutual success.

This has always been a natural value for ABAX. We want to make decisions and keep momentum. Whether it‚Äôs a sales meeting, an internal meeting, a project or an internal team campaign - it always takes place with a positive attitude and a great drive.

We strive to find solutions that do more with fewer resources. We care about our environment, our colleagues, our customers, and the communities we operate in. ‚ÄãThrough our¬† collaboration with our customers and partners, we create solutions that can be expanded and developed over the long term. This ensures that our solutions can be used for a long time and that the investments pay off. It is important to us that our customers use their assets and resources efficiently and responsibly so that they can use them safely, and efficiently, and increase the lifetime of their units ‚Äì all for the better of their profitability and the good of our environment society at large.
But if you ask our HR department - a sustainable workforce is first and foremost, inside and outside of work. Feeling valued and engaged is what we believe is key for sustainable employees!

Without our customers, there is no ABAX - simple as that. That is why we put the needs and requirements of our customers at the center of our thinking and actions. At ABAX, we take¬†the customer perspective and use technology and data to develop solutions for their daily challenges and opportunities, and thus for their business success. Simple but powerful solutions that can be intuitively embedded into their daily work and thus add value to their business on a day-to-day basis.

In the ABAX tech section we have the ability to work completely autonomously in cross-functional teams and have a big influence on the final product. There is also great freedom in choosing what tools and workflows we individually like to use in our daily work.

I get to learn from my mistakes, pick myself up and go again.

üè¢ Accommodating office spaces We want to make it easy for you to enjoy your working time. We provide you with spacious collaboration spaces and in some of our offices we also offer a cafeteria as well as relaxation spaces.
ü§ùPension & HealthcareWorking for ABAX, we ensure that you are provided for.
üìò On-the-job-training and internal development programsYour growth is our growth! That is why we invest in our people.

üíôTeam building eventsWe facilitate after-works, hackathons and team building events for you and your colleagues. This includes twice a year kickoffs with the whole company as well as team campaigns.

InnovativeWe always look for new ways to approach a challenge. We bring people, technology, data, and ideas together to develop solutions for tomorrow. We are curious and embrace change.‚Äã Together with our customers and partners, we systematically look for new ways to leverage potential for existing business and new business opportunities through the networking of objects and data. For mutual success.

EnthusiasticThis has always been a natural value for ABAX. We want to make decisions and keep momentum. Whether it‚Äôs a sales meeting, an internal meeting, a project or an internal team campaign - it always takes place with a positive attitude and a great drive.

SustainableWe strive to find solutions that do more with fewer resources. We care about our environment, our colleagues, our customers, and the communities we operate in. ‚ÄãThrough our¬† collaboration with our customers and partners, we create solutions that can be expanded and developed over the long term. This ensures that our solutions can be used for a long time and that the investments pay off. It is important to us that our customers use their assets and resources efficiently and responsibly so that they can use them safely, and efficiently, and increase the lifetime of their units ‚Äì all for the better of their profitability and the good of our environment society at large.But if you ask our HR department - a sustainable workforce is first and foremost, inside and outside of work. Feeling valued and engaged is what we believe is key for sustainable employees!

Customer-centricWithout our customers, there is no ABAX - simple as that. That is why we put the needs and requirements of our customers at the center of our thinking and actions. At ABAX, we take¬†the customer perspective and use technology and data to develop solutions for their daily challenges and opportunities, and thus for their business success. Simple but powerful solutions that can be intuitively embedded into their daily work and thus add value to their business on a day-to-day basis.

In the ABAX tech section we have the ability to work completely autonomously in cross-functional teams and have a big influence on the final product. There is also great freedom in choosing what tools and workflows we individually like to use in our daily work.Even BekkedalTeam Lead Mobile in Norway

I get to learn from my mistakes, pick myself up and go again.Jon HearnGlobal Performance & Project Manager

Let's jump right in! Get startedAPI referenceSamplesAPI Catalog Manage the API Gateway, integrate the traffic & consumption, manage your files Trips APIRead documentationVehicles APIRead documentationEquipment APIRead documentationOrganization APIRead documentationGetting started Start building in no time with these Tutorials Setting up client credentials In order to authenticate the user via OpenID Connect, you will first need to create an app in the ABAX Developer Portal and get the client credentials Read moreAuthorizing access to API Access to the data in the ABAX Open API always happens in a context of an ABAX User. The user grants access for an app to use the data on their behalf. Read moreCalling the API Call the selected API endpoint with the access token in the Authorization header Read moreRate limiting and quota ABAX applies rate limiting per app accessing the API to ensure stable operation Read moreWhat's new ‚Äî our changelog04.11.2022 ‚Äî version 1.16.0 The Odometer Readings cannot be longer returned for each trip in generic GET Trips endpoint.  A new dedicated endpoint has been created for that purpose. Trips APIBreaking change04.10.2022 ‚Äî version 1.15.0 Updated Trips API that now offers a new endpoint to get the expense and extra data of trips. Trips APINew feature06.07.2022 ‚Äî version 1.12.0 Introducing new API Driving behaviour endpoint. From now on you can easily get the current driving behaviour score for all your drivers or the organization. Access to Driving behaviour API requires scope - open_api.driving_behaviour. Driving behaviour APINew feature02.06.2022 ‚Äî version 1.10.0 Updated equipment API that now offers a new endpoint to get the usage time for an asset. Equipment API13.09.2021 ‚Äî version 1.6.0 Updated Equipment endpoint with OEM sensor data for assets connected via Smart Connect. Equipment API04.03.2021 ‚Äî version 1.5.0 Updated Equipment endpoint and from now it supports multi usage logs. Equipment API10.02.2021 ‚Äî version 1.3.6 Vehicle positions will only be returned for units configured with fleet feature enabled. Vehicle API01.02.2021 ‚Äî version 1.3.5 Increased the limit in the Trip endpoint. From now it is possible to be getting trips dated more than 3 months back in time. The time frame for the trips remain the same and they should be within 3 month time period. Trips API30.06.2020 ‚Äî version 1.3.0 Introducing new API Capabilities endpoint. From now on you can easily get to know which API operation can be performed by a particular user. Access to Capabilities API requires scope - open_api. Capabilities APINew feature16.04.2020 ‚Äî version 1.2.0 Introducing new Organization API with People endpoint. From now on you can receive information about people in your organization. Access to Organization API requires new scope - open_api.organization. Organization APINew feature5.03.2020 ‚Äî version 1.1.5 Added request validators, the same as in production OpenAPI. Items ids will no longer be randomly generated. Changed behaviour of filtering data. Previously, no matter the filter you applied, system returned the first element of the list with replaced id (e.g. vehicle id in trips endpoint). Now you can filter out specific item from the list. Open API sandbox4.02.2020 ‚Äî version 1.1.2 Fixed missing driver's ExternalId in get trip endpoint. ExternalId was missing in case of private trips registered by a commercial vehicle. Trips API16.01.2020 ‚Äî version 1.1.1 Added ExternalId property to Driver in get vehicle by id, get vehicles and get trips endpoints. It can be used to map data in triplog with external systems. Check specification for more details. Vehicles APITrips API16.01.2020 ‚Äî version 1.1.0 Introducing new endpoint in the Vehicle API - Vehicle Drive States. From now on you can receive information on what is happening with the vehicle - is it parked, driving or idling. This is ABAXLet‚Äôs navigate back in time to how the small, Norwegian startup evolved into a significant SaaS company with phenomenal growth. It all started in the small town of Larvik, Norway in 2007. The entrepreneurs Bj√∏rn Erik Brands√¶ter Helgeland and Petter Quinsgaard had an idea of being the solution provider for basic tracking needs through high-quality GPS positioning. With a significant in-house developing team, ABAX soon found new ways in using data going from being hardware-centric to hardware agnostic to help the customer manage their assets, in new ways.¬† In 2022, we simplify the everyday life of our customers by providing intuitive solutions that help them become more efficient.We have grown from being a vehicle tracking company covering mileage claims to becoming a leading SaaS provider, offering management solutions for all moving company assets¬†such as vehicles, machinery, equipment, and tools.¬†We have more than¬†300 employees divided between sales, customer¬†service, marketing, people and performance as well as quality and product development. We have offices in¬†Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, the Netherlands, Belgium, Poland and the UK with our headquarters in Larvik, Norway.¬†Are you ready to build both yourself as an individual as well as products¬†that have an impact on people‚Äôs everyday life? Then apply to¬†one of our open positions! Join the team. Build the Future.

Our ValuesInnovativeWe always look for new ways to approach a challenge. We bring people, technology, data, and ideas together to develop solutions for tomorrow. We are curious and embrace change.‚Äã Together with our customers and partners, we systematically look for new ways to leverage potential for existing business and new business opportunities through the networking of objects and data. For mutual success.¬†EnthusiasticThis has always been a natural value for ABAX. We want to make decisions and keep momentum. Whether it‚Äôs a sales meeting, an internal meeting, a project or an internal team campaign - it always takes place with a positive attitude and a great drive.SustainableWe strive to find solutions that do more with fewer resources. We care about our environment, our colleagues, our customers, and the communities we operate in. ‚ÄãThrough our¬† collaboration with our customers and partners, we create solutions that can be expanded and developed over the long term. This ensures that our solutions can be used for a long time and that the investments pay off. It is important to us that our customers use their assets and resources efficiently and responsibly so that they can use them safely, and efficiently, and increase the lifetime of their units ‚Äì all for the better of their profitability and the good of our environment society at large.But if you ask our HR department - a sustainable workforce is first and foremost, inside and outside of work. Feeling valued and engaged is what we believe is key for sustainable employees!¬†Customer-centricWithout our customers, there is no ABAX - simple as that. That is why we put the needs and requirements of our customers at the center of our thinking and actions. At ABAX, we take¬†the customer perspective and use technology and data to develop solutions for their daily challenges and opportunities, and thus for their business success. Simple but powerful solutions that can be intuitively embedded into their daily work and thus add value to their business on a day-to-day basis.
